CEO Message

리마 GLOBAL은 신선하고 깨끗한 먹거리 문화를 만들고자 ''과 ''을 담아 세계화 상품을 소개하고 있습니다.

특히 대한민국의 우수한 먹거리 문화를 수출을 통해 세계 여러 나라에 전파하여 또 하나의 한류 열풍으로 자리 잡도록 최선을 다하는 회사가 되도록 하겠습니다.

저희 리마 GLOBAL 먹거리 문화마당을 찾아 주시어 감사합니다. E-리마글러벌에 오시어 여러분의 좋은 조언 많이 올려 주시면 성심성의 다해 시행 하도록 노력하겠습니다.

감사합니다.

(주)리마글러벌 대표이사 임종세

RIMA GLOBAL is dedicated to providing our consumers with the best possible products. Especially, RIMA GLOBAL focus on speared excellent Korean produces & grocery items all over the world. And by following this model of innovation and excellence, RIMA GLOBAL currently stands as a leading food company.

RIMA GLOBAL is dedicated to working toward the healthy development of the communities in which our foods are sold. Our priority is always will be our customers and quality.

Our goal is to bring a smile to the faces of all the people who enjoy our products. We will listen to your voice and do our best. Thank you for visitation E-RIMA GLOBAL.

Sincerely.

RIMA GLOBAL CEO LIM, JONG SE

PRINCIPLES

넓고 큰 세상으로 진출하는 전문인들의 글로벌화된 마음가짐과 소비자를 우선시 하는 SYSTEM을 구축하여 미래를 향해 전진하는 RIMA GLOBAL입니다.

RIMA has focused on the top end fruit and vegetables quality markets. We are committed to supplying the best quality products to the world. The company deals with a limited number of carefully selected growers who share our approach to quality.

RIMA provides full back up and support on all aspects of exporting perishable produce such as packaging, logistics, shipping, marketing and administration. We guide producer with regard to packing to the correct specifications for each market requirement and our strict quality control elimnates the risk of shipping unsuitable product.

HISTORY

Jul, 2004
Establish RIMA GLOBAL CO., LTD
Nov. 2006
Presidential Award for Million Dollar Export
Nov, 2007
Excellence Award of the Minister of Agriculture
Aug, 2009
Everhills Co., Ltd, establish in Youngkwang Gun, Jeonnam, Korea
Jun, 2010
Everhills Foods Inc., establish in LA, USA
Nov, 2010
Presidential Award for Three Million Dollar Export
May, 2012
Presidential Award for Five Million Dollar Export
